body: Thanks, Abraham! Good to know the area component can get the centroid of a geometry! My approach in the attached GH file is to use one of the four corners of a mesh as an anchor to position the text, and I add a few more components for rounding the decimal number of the values. However, this only seems to work for bar chart, not for 3D chart ... Advices are appreciated!
